---
title: "Keyless Simple Example"
---

Explore the code in [libra2-keyless-example repository](https://github.com/libra2org/libra2-keyless-example/tree/main/examples/keyless-example/).

The Keyless Simple Example is currently undergoing maintenance. Please check back later.

This is a live Keyless example on StackBlitz. Follow the instructions in the `README.md` to add your own Google `client_id`. Explore the code in [libra2-keyless-example repository](https://github.com/libra2org/libra2-keyless-example/tree/main/examples/keyless-example/).
